objective: I'm a full-stack software engineer with more than two decades of experience in building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. I thrive in both individual and team settings, delivering high-quality solutions that combine technical excellence with user-centric design. My expertise spans distributed systems, modern JavaScript frameworks, and back-end development.

positions.title: Lead Developer / Co-owner
description: Build an engaging online trivia game using Svelte, Supabase, and custom CSS, minimizing node modules to create a lightweight application that works well on both desktop and mobile devices.
Transform game data into statistics suitable for user rankings, comparisons, and automated league categorization.
Conduct user behavior analysis and customer interviews to identify feature opportunities and improve engagement.

positions.title: Software Engineer, Contractor
description: Develop custom WordPress sites using Bootstrap and Tailwind, enhancing functionality through custom code and with plugins like Advanced Custom Fields.
Collaborate with clients to break down requirements and plan development work, focusing on mobile responsiveness and accessibility.
Automate workflows for CI/CD pipelines across WPEngine and customer hosted environments.

positions.title: Lead Software Engineer
description: Led a team focused on customer and product growth to implement new features in Python and React/TypeScript, working closely with Product, Sales, and Support.
Improved application performance by reducing build size through browser analysis and package optimization.
Supervised remote contractors in finalizing an internal Design System, ensuring consistent code quality and design patterns.

positions.title: Staff Software Engineer / Tech Lead, Growth Engineering
description: Supported multiple teams in developing scalable and fault-tolerant systems for customer growth and onboarding.
Mentored engineers on project and task management, engineering best practices, problem-solving, and code quality.
Oversaw remote contractors and streamlined team productivity by clarifying expectations and task definitions.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer 1 & 2
description: Contributed to various teams, including Growth Engineering, Experimentation Platform, Phone Numbers, and Console Development.
Built a customer data platform to support the experimentation platform and enable teams to make run-time decisions about their customers based on live data and computed metrics.
Designed customer workflow and built systems to support a regulatory process for provisioning phone numbers in compliance with worldwide, country-specific rules.

Deconstructed a monolithic console code base to enable individual teams to support their development lifecycles, decrease contention over core sections of the codebase, and enable different teams to adopt the back-end languages that were right for them.
Drove a culture of testing as a normal part of the development lifecycle Increased adoption of technologies and tooling to improve system observability and drive down recovery time from errors.

patents.title: Multi-Jurisdictional Endpoint Allocation Compliance
description: A system for evaluating and verifying jurisdictional eligibility to allocate resources based on identification data and regulatory rule sets.

positions.title: Senior Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for building on and extending WordPress as a publishing platform.
Developed project requirements and plans for projects ranging from plugin development to API integrations to large-scale deployments
Developed systems built on top of CodeIgniter that take advantage of Amazon cloud services to scale to meet the demands of high-volume, time-sensitive data processing.

positions.title: Web Developer & Designer
description: Maintained the client-facing website and client portal for a hardware, software, and technical services distributor. Built a custom framework for managing product information, client portal access, and educational class schedules. Provided the marketing team with tools to help efficiently develop client communications.
